channel.title: Help on serverupdate
channel.description: i need a commands that i put ::update (minute or sec) plz help me

item.title: Help on serverupdate
item.dc:creator: @shamu308 shamu308
item.description:
@shamu308 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:311272”][quote author=shamu308 link=topic=407716.msg3010969#msg3010969 date=1256769200]

if(command.startsWith("update") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name") && (command.length() > 7)) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command .substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

that to me dont work
[/quote]

change “name” to your ingame server name, compile then run and try.[/quote]
it still dont work for me

Read full topic

item.title: Help on serverupdate
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“shamu308, post:3, topic:311272”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=407716.msg3010961#msg3010961 date=1256768957]

if(command.startsWith("update") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name") && (command.length() > 7)) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command .substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
[/quote]
that to me dont work[/quote]

change “name” to your ingame server name, compile then run and try.

Read full topic
